# Cult UI Components

Cult UI components integrated and adapted for the Digital Garden design system.

## Source

All components are from [Cult UI](https://www.cult-ui.com/).

## Components

- MinimalCard - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/minimal-card)
- TextureCard - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/texture-card)
- ShiftCard - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/shift-card)
- Expandable - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/expandable)
- ExpandableScreen - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/expandable-screen)
- NeumorphButton - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/neumorph-button)
- BGAnimatedButton - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/bg-animate-button)
- Dock - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/dock)
- DirectionAwareTabs - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/direction-aware-tabs)
- PopoverForm - [Source](https://www.cult-ui.com/docs/components/popover-form)
